events.message: Customer reported a car accident involving their vehicle and another car on the highway. Damage seems moderate; claim officially filed for processing.
Claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident due to reported vehicle collision on public road.
An agent experienced in auto accident claims was assigned to manage the customer's case promptly.
Customer was sent an official acknowledgment for their vehicle accident claim with expected timelines mentioned.
Requested the customer to provide auto repair estimates, police report, and photographs from the accident scene.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report and repair estimates for the damaged vehicle.
Initial investigation into the circumstances of the auto accident began to verify the claim details and validity.
Investigation concluded positively confirming liability and damage extent on the customer's vehicle.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer covering repairs and associated costs of the auto accident damage.
Customer responded positively to the settlement proposal expressing satisfaction with the offer made.
Claim has been officially approved following the customer's agreement to the proposed settlement terms.
Payment for the approved auto accident claim was issued to the customerâ€™s designated bank account.
The auto accident claim has been closed successfully after full payment and confirmation from the customer.
All documents and details related to this auto accident claim were archived for future reference and audit.
